mapper.sql: id, org_id, top_org_id, post_name, post_type, create_time, update_time, is_delete
mapper.select:
select
from org_post where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete = 1
mapper.insert: insert into org_post (id, org_id, top_org_id, post_name, post_type, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{topOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{postName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into org_post
id,
org_id,
top_org_id,
post_name,
post_type,
create_time,
update_time,
is_delete,

mapper.update:
update org_post
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
top_org_id = #{topOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
post_name = #{postName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_type = #{postType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update org_post set org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, top_org_id = #{topOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, post_name = #{postName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_type = #{postType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select op.id as id, op.post_name as postName, op.post_type postType, op.create_time createTime, count(os.id) clerkCount from (select * from org_post where org_id=#{paramObject} and is_delete=1 ) op LEFT JOIN org_staff os on op.id = os.post_id and os.is_delete=1 LEFT JOIN user_info ui on os.user_id = ui.id and ui.is_delete=1 where op.post_type BETWEEN 2 AND 3 GROUP BY op.id ORDER BY op.create_time desc LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

select count(tmp.id) counts from ( select op.id, op.post_name, op.post_type, count(os.id) post_count from (select * from org_post where org_id=#{paramObject} and is_delete=1) op LEFT JOIN org_staff os on op.id = os.post_id and os.is_delete=1 LEFT JOIN user_info ui on os.user_id = ui.id and ui.is_delete=1 where op.post_type BETWEEN 2 AND 3 GROUP BY op.id ) tmp

select * from org_post where org_id = #{orgId} and post_name = #{postName} and is_delete=1 and post_type BETWEEN 2 AND 3
and id != #{id}

id,

post_name,
post_type,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update org_post
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
top_org_id = #{topOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
post_name = #{postName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_type = #{postType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select p.* from org_staff s inner join org_post p on s.post_id = p.id where s.is_delete = 1 and p.is_delete = 1 and s.id = #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT id, org_id AS orgId, post_name AS postName, post_type AS postType, create_time as createTime FROM org_post WHERE org_id = #{orgId} AND is_delete = 1 and post_type=3 UNION SELECT op.id, op.org_id AS orgId, op.post_name AS postName, op.post_type AS postType, op.create_time as createTime FROM (select * from org_post where org_id = #{orgId} AND is_delete = 1 and post_type=2 ) op LEFT JOIN (select * from org_staff where is_delete=1 and org_id = #{orgId}) os on op.id = os.post_id WHERE os.id is null ) tmp ORDER BY tmp.createTime desc
select id, org_id as orgId, post_name as postName from org_post where org_id=#{orgId} and is_delete=1 and post_type = #{postType}
